DOC.brief_title: An Assessment Safety Pharmacokinetics Ascending Doses SANGUINATE™ Healthy Volunteers .
DOC.detailed_description: Safety Pharmacokinetic assessment ascend dos SANGUINATE™ Healthy Volunteers .
DOC.criteria: Male Volunteers ; Age ≥18 year ≤45 year ; BMI ≥20 ≤30 kg/m² No clinically significant screen observation Female volunteer ; Any history significant cardiac , renal , neurologic , metabolic , pulmonary , gastrointestinal , chronic hepatic disease disease judgment Investigator would interfere study confound result ; History allergy major allergic reaction consider clinically significant Investigator ; Any screen assessment determine clinically significant Investigator ; Donate blood within 60 day screen otherwise experience blood loss > 250 mL within period ;
